      • resolveMessageValue

        @Nonnull
public Object resolveMessageValue(@Nonnull
                                 String key,
                                 @Nonnull
                                 Locale locale)
                           throws NoSuchMessageException
        Description copied from interface: MessageSource

        Resolve a message given a key and a Locale.

        This method should use the default Locale if the locale argument is null. The key argument may refer to another key if the resolved value results in a CharSequence that begins with "@[" and ends with "]". In this case the method will use the enclosed value as the next key to be resolved. For example, given the following key/value definitions 

             some.key = Hello {0}
     other.key = @[some.key]

        Evaluating the keys results in 

            assert resolveMessageValue('some.key', Locale.default) == 'Hello {0}'
    assert resolveMessageValue('other.key', Locale.default) == 'Hello {0}'

        Specified by:
        resolveMessageValue in interface MessageSource
        Parameters:
        key - Key to lookup, such as 'log4j.appenders.console'
        locale - Locale in which to lookup
        Returns:
        the resolved message value at the given key for the given locale
        Throws:
        NoSuchMessageException - if no message is found

      • formatMessage

        @Nonnull
public String formatMessage(@Nonnull
                           String message,
                           @Nonnull
                           List<?> args)
        Description copied from interface: MessageSource
        Formats the given message using supplied args to substitute placeholders.
        Specified by:
        formatMessage in interface MessageSource
        Parameters:
        message - The message following a predefined format.
        args - Arguments that will be filled in for params within the message (params look like "{0}" within a message, but this might differ between implementations), or null if none.
        Returns:
        the formatted message with all matching placeholders with their substituted values.
